data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains i) all regional and local environmental variables measured in the field of our 8 sites across France, ii) all taxonomic information on the plots of every site, and iii) the community-weighted mean of the functional variables used in this study. A brief metadata to describe each variable was also included. This file contains all the data necessary to reproduce the results in our study.
